channel.title: Connection error - Retrying in [seconds]
channel.description:
Need help with this. when i open my client i get this [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3AhydBI.png[/img]
[u][b]and this is what shows in the CMD[/b][/u] [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\kerrie\Deathlypvpzv5\Da ta\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:146) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:101) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:176) at client.startUp(client.java:8302) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)[/code]

item.title: Connection error - Retrying in [seconds]

nevermind i figured it out, thanks heaps.
